Class TextFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.transformations.TextFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Layerable

    public class TextFilter
extends Object
implements Layerable
    Adds a chosen text to the picture

        Sets the setting for the text filter
        Parameters:

        font - which font the text should have
        size - the size of the text
        yPosition - where the text should be places
        r - red-value
        g - green-value
